= cplinked =

== Format ==
cg cplinked ?options? source ... dest

== Summary ==
create a copy of a directory (or directories) where each file in it is a softlink to the src.

== Arguments ==
; source: directory to be copied
; dest: destination directory

== Options ==
; -absolute 0/1: softlinks will use absolute paths if 1, relative paths if 0 (default)

== Category ==
Tools
